title: MYTHRIL CODEX Lightweight Browser RPG + NFT  on Cardano
summary: Web3 gaming lacks simple, low-friction entry points with verifiable character ownership. Cardano requires a lightweight, browser-native gateway to onboard new users using TTRPG mechanics.
solution: MYTHRIL CODEX delivers a deterministic RPG adventure via the browser. The compact MVP utilizes a full CIP-30 mint pipeline to validate character ownership as a scalable entry point for Cardano gaming.
proposer_relevant_experience:
Astel Lee

Role: Project Creator & Designer

Experience:

•	Visual Designer: Professional background in UI/UX and Art Direction. I ensure the game is not just functional, but visually polished and intuitive for players.

•	Storywriter: Creator of the entire MYTHRIL CODEX universe, narrative branches, and game mechanics.

•	Technical Implementation: A hands-on builder bridging design and code. Instead of complex custom engineering, I utilize standard open-source libraries and official developer documentation to implement the game logic. I have already built the initial playable prototype by strictly following established development patterns.

sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
●	First Lightweight TTRPG-Style Adventure on Cardano: Designed for 5–10 minute sessions, fitting perfectly into users' fragmented time. It lowers the barrier to entry while offering deep, strategic gameplay unlike simple clickers.

●	True Asset Utility: Playable, Not Just Collectible: We bridge the gap between "Free-to-Play" and "Own-to-Play." Unminted characters are temporary; minting transforms them into permanent, usable assets. These NFTs are not just static collectibles—they are required to save progress, carry over stats, and unlock future content.

●	Retro Terminal UI for Instant Onboarding: No complex art assets to load, no downloads required. It works instantly on any browser (mobile/desktop), focusing on imagination over graphics.

●	Rust/WASM Deterministic Engine: Every adventure outcome is determined by verifiable Dice-Rolling Mechanics (non-black-box), ensuring fairness and reproducibility.

●	Designed for Measurable On-Chain Activity: The game design drives conversion. Users start for free, but the desire to keep their character drives the minting transaction, creating a sustainable loop of on-chain activity.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
1. Build the Deterministic Core Game Engine, enabling fast, reproducible text-based gameplay.
2. Implement 4 unique character classes (Knight, Paladin, Mage, Dark Mage), each with dynamic attribute-based outcomes.
3. Create a retro CRT UI optimized for minimal friction and maximum readability.
4. Integrate CIP-30 wallets for secure identity and payments.
5. Deploy NFT minting contracts on Cardano using Aiken.
6. Run adventure sessions, letting users experience TTRPG-style dice mechanics in minutes.
7. Mint characters on-chain, proving "lightweight dungeon crawler → real asset ownership" works.



Why Blockchain Is Required: MYTHRIL CODEX requires blockchain because the core game mechanic—minting characters as persistent, ownable, verifiable game assets—cannot be achieved with a Web2 database without sacrificing fairness or ownership.



Blockchain guarantees:

●	Verifiable NFT ownership for characters.

●	Immutable metadata (stats, adventure outcomes).

●	Transparent rarity distribution.

●	Tamper-proof adventure history.

●	Cross-game interoperability.

Without blockchain, characters become merely account-bound data. With blockchain, characters become player-owned assets that can be traded, reused, or integrated into future games.

Why Cardano?

●	Low fees: Ideal for high-frequency microtransactions and mass minting.

●	UTxO deterministic model: Perfect for reproducible game logic.

●	Strong NFT culture: Provides an existing collector ecosystem.

●	CIP-30 wallet standard: Instant browser integration, no app required. Cardano enables the vision of "true ownership for lightweight games" better than any other chain.

Risks & Mitigation:

●	Smart Contract Verification Delays: Minimized by using Aiken (which is safer by design) and implementing a rigorous automated testing suite instead of relying solely on slow external audits.

●	Low Early User Adoption: Addressed with a "Free-to-Play, Own-to-Mint" model and frictionless browser onboarding.

●	Engine Logic Issues: Covered through deterministic engine unit tests and a closed user playtest (Beta).

●	NFT Metadata Compatibility: Avoided by strictly following CIP-68 / CIP-25 standards.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
MYTHRIL CODEX strengthens the Cardano ecosystem by:

●	Introducing a New Gateway Genre: It launches the first lightweight TTRPG-style text adventure on Cardano. This low-friction genre acts as a perfect funnel to onboard non-crypto gamers who are intimidated by complex DeFi or heavy 3D games.

●	Driving On-Chain Activity: Every user journey culminates in a transaction. By turning game characters into NFTs, we generate consistent on-chain activity (minting and metadata updates) from real utility, not just speculation.

●	Releasing Reusable Infrastructure (Open Source): While the game content is proprietary, we will open-source the "Cardano Game Connector" modules (Wallet integration + Minting logic). This reduces the technical barrier for the next wave of indie developers entering the ecosystem.

●	Growing the NFT User Base: We provide a use case where NFTs are functional assets, not just JPEGs. This educates users on the true value of digital ownership and expands the active NFT collector base on Cardano.

Value to the Community: The project delivers immediate playable content for users and long-term technical building blocks for developers, ensuring ROI for the ecosystem beyond just the game itself.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Capability to Deliver: Focused Scope & Design-Led Execution I am a professional Designer and Storyteller stepping into development. My capability to deliver rests on Scope Control and Product Clarity:

•	Simple Technology Stack: The project is intentionally designed as a lightweight text adventure. It does not require complex graphics rendering or high-performance physics, making it fully achievable for a single developer using standard web tools.

•	Clear Roadmap: I have already finalized the game logic, UI design, and storyline scripts. The development phase is purely execution, not exploration.

•	Standard Implementation: For the blockchain components, I strictly follow official Cardano developer guides and standard templates (CIP-30/CIP-25), avoiding experimental or overly complex smart contracts.

Feasibility Validation:

1.	Logic Verification: Since the game relies on text and math (dice rolls), the logic is easy to test and verify without expensive infrastructure.

2.	Pilot Testing: I will run a closed beta with a small group of users to ensure the "Connect Wallet -> Play -> Mint" flow works smoothly before public launch.

3.	Step-by-Step Delivery: The project is broken down into small, manageable milestones to ensure steady progress.

No outsourcing is required. By keeping the scope realistic and the technology standard, I can personally guarantee delivery and accountability.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
1.High output, cost-efficient: Delivering a complete game MVP + mint pipeline in 7 months (not 3) by leveraging an AI-first, human-backed workflow. This ensures high velocity without the overhead of a large engineering team.

2. Strategic Resource Allocation: We adopt a lean, single-developer workflow to maximize capital efficiency, avoiding the high burn rate of large teams. Crucially, the budget includes a safety buffer to hire external technical consultants for specific roadblocks if necessary, ensuring delivery is never compromised.

3.Reusable Open Source Infrastructure: While the game IP is proprietary, the Wallet Connector and Minting Modules will be open-sourced, allowing other Cardano developers to adopt these tools.

4.Long-term value: MYTHRIL CODEX becomes a low-friction gateway for onboarding non-crypto users into Cardano through accessible TTRPG-style gaming.

5.Measurable On-Chain Activity: The "Play-to-Mint" design ensures utility: every character creation and update results in a real on-chain transaction, directly increasing network usage.

6.Ecosystem Growth: Fund 15 invests in a Designer-Led project that prioritizes UX and storytelling, creating a new, sustainable genre for the Cardano gaming ecosystem.
